description: Dashboard showing Prometheus Alertmanager metrics for observing status of the cluster and possible debbuging.

links.title: Twitter
links.tooltip: Twitter account with prometheus related info

panels.description: Number of all instances running Prometheus Alertmanager service
panels.title: Instances

panels.description: List of filtered Prometheus instances showing service version, uptime, last reload time, reload status, and cluster member status
panels.title: Instance Info

panels.description: Current number of active alerts for $instance instance
panels.title: Active Alerts@$instance

panels.description: Current number of suppressed alerts for $instance instance
panels.title: Suppressed Alerts@$instance

panels.description: Current number of active silences for $instance instance
panels.title: Silences@$instance

panels.description: Current number of active alerts for $instance instance
panels.title: Active Alerts@$instance

panels.description: Current number of suppressed alerts for $instance instance
panels.title: Suppressed Alerts@$instance

panels.description: Current number of active silences for $instance instance
panels.title: Silences@$instance

panels.description: Number of sent notifications to distinct integrations such as PagerDuty, Slack and so on. On negative axis are displayed failed notifications
panels.title: Sent@$instance

panels.description: Duration of notification sent in 0.99 and 0.9 quantiles per integration
panels.title: Duration@$instance

panels.description: Number of alerts by state such as `active`, `suppressed` etc.
panels.title: Active@$instance

panels.description: Number of received alerts from Prometheus by status `firing` on positive axis and `resolved` on negative axis.
panels.title: Received@$instance

panels.description:
Shows cluster score representing cluster health. From Hashicorps official documentation: 
> This metric describes a node's perception of its own health based on how well it is meeting the soft real-time requirements of the protocol. This metric ranges from 0 to 8, where 0 indicates "totally healthy".

For more info see https://www.consul.io/docs/agent/telemetry.html#cluster-health
panels.title: Health Score@$instance

panels.description: Shows gossip cluster members count in time and failing peers in case of any in red colour
panels.title: Members@$instance

panels.description: On positive axis shows number of peers that joined the cluster and on negative axis number of peers that left the cluster
panels.title: Peers@$instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of attempts to reconnect the cluster. On negative axis if number of failed attempts
panels.title: Reconnections@$instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages
panels.title: Messages@$instance

panels.description: On positive axis is size of sent cluster messages by type `update`  or `full_state` and on negative axis the same for received messages
panels.title: Messages Size@$instance

panels.description: On positive axis is number of queued cluster messages and on negative axis number of pruned messages
panels.title: Messages Queued@$instance

panels.description: Rate of oversized gossip message sent/dropped/failed for $instance instance
panels.title: Oversized@$instance

panels.description: Histogram of a duration of oversized gossip message requests for $instance instance
panels.title: Oversized Duration@$instance

panels.description: Rate of  propagated gossip messages for notification logs and silences for $instance instance
panels.title: Propagated@$instance

panels.description: Rate of notification log queries that were received by $instance instance
panels.title: Queries@$instance

panels.description: Histogram of the duration of notification log query evaluation for $instance instance
panels.title: Query Duration@$instance

panels.description: Size of the last notification log snapshot for $instance instance
panels.title: Snapshot Size@$instance

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log snapshot for $instance instance
panels.title: Snapshot Duration@$instance

panels.description: Duration of the last notification log garbage collection cycle (0.99 quantile) for $instance instance
panels.title: Go GC Time@$instance

panels.description: The total number of silences counted by the state for $instance instance
panels.title: Total@$instance

panels.description: How many silence queries were received and how many of them failed  for $instance instance
panels.title: Query@$instance

panels.description: Silences query evaluation duration for $instance instance
panels.title: Query Duration@$instance

panels.description: Size of the last silence snapshot for $instance instance
panels.title: Snapshot Size$instance

panels.description: Duration of the last silence snapshot (0.99 quantile) for $instance instance
panels.title: Snapshot Duration@$instance

panels.description: Duration of the last silence garbage collection cycle for $instance instance
panels.title: GC Duraton@$instance

panels.description: Rate of  CPU time usage for Alertmanager $instance instance
panels.title: CPU@$instance

panels.description: Memory usage for Alertmanager $instance instance
panels.title: Memory@$instance

panels.description: Rate of  CPU time usage for Alertmanager $instance instance
panels.title: CPU@$instance

panels.description: Memory usage for Alertmanager $instance instance
panels.title: Memory@$instance

title: Alertmanager
